snippet: Prosecutors have filed charges against former NBA forward Kermit Washington, accusing him of embezzling about a half-million dollars in charitable donations meant to help the needy in Africa and spending it on jewelry, vacations and other things....
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have filed charges against former NBA forward Kermit Washington, accusing him of embezzling about a half-million dollars in charitable donations meant to help the needy in Africa and spending it on jewelry, vacations and other things.

headline.main: Kermit Washington Accused of Stealing From His Charity
headline.print_headline: Kermit Washington Accused of Stealing From His Charity
